thread.title: Patricia Varcoe
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Patricia Varcoe

author: Patricia Varcoe
title: Patricia Varcoe
text: They were the wrong flowers together with no card and no comments that I made to my granddaughter. No one was at home at the time of delivery on the 4th of Feb so they had to picked up on the 6th, when it was picked up they were wilted and and only lasted two days. I know for the price I paid they should of lasted at least 2 weeks with good care even longer maybe. It is so sad that my granddaughter never got to read my comments to her for her birthday.Very Very Very Sad.Oh I almost forgot to mention that the vase was plastic and too big for the bouquet I would of paid more for a glass vase .
